name: api_editor_AssetDatabase
description: An Interface for accessing assets and performing operations on assets.

properties.name: AddObjectToAsset
properties.description: Adds objectToAdd to an existing asset at path.

properties.name: AllowAutoRefresh
properties.description: Decrements an internal counter which Unity uses to determine whether to allow automatic AssetDatabase refreshing behavior.

properties.name: AssetPathExists
properties.description: Check whether an asset exists at the given path in the database.

properties.name: AssetPathToGUID
properties.description: Get the GUID for the asset at path.

properties.name: CanConnectToCacheServer
properties.description: Checks the availability of the Cache Server.

properties.name: CanOpenAssetInEditor
properties.description: Checks if Unity can open an asset in the Editor.

properties.name: CanOpenForEdit
properties.description: Query whether an Asset file can be opened for editing in version control and is not exclusively locked by another user or otherwise unavailable.

properties.name: ClearImporterOverride
properties.description: Clears the importer override for the asset.

properties.name: ClearLabels
properties.description: Removes all labels attached to an asset.

properties.name: CloseCacheServerConnection
properties.description: Closes an active cache server connection. If no connection is active, then it does nothing.

properties.name: Contains
properties.description: Checks whether a given object is an asset.

properties.name: CopyAsset
properties.description: Duplicates the asset at path and stores it at newPath.

properties.name: CopyAssets
properties.description: Duplicates assets in paths and stores them in newPaths.

properties.name: CreateAsset
properties.description: Creates a new asset in a native Unity format.

properties.name: CreateFolder
properties.description: Creates a new folder, in the specified parent folder.The parent folder string must start with the "Assets" folder, and all folders within the parent folder string must already exist. For example, when specifying "Assets/ParentFolder1/Parentfolder2/", the new folder will be created in "ParentFolder2" only if ParentFolder1 and ParentFolder2 already exist.

properties.name: DeleteAsset
properties.description: Deletes the specified asset or folder.

properties.name: DeleteAssets
properties.description: Lets you delete multiple assets or folders at once with performance benefits under version control.

properties.name: DisallowAutoRefresh
properties.description: Increments an internal counter which Unity uses to determine whether to allow automatic AssetDatabase refreshing behavior.

properties.name: EntityIdsToGUIDs
properties.description: Sets a NativeArray of UnityEditor.GUIDs for every valid EntityId that is an asset.

properties.name: ExportPackage
properties.description: Exports the assets identified by assetPathNames to a unitypackage file in fileName.
